price: “Kandi ko umunyabwenge buke muri twe (Shitani) yajyaga avuga ibidahwitse kuri Allah.”
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ يَقُولُ سَفِيهُنَا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ شَطَطٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna yaqūlu safīhunā ʿalā al-lahi shaṭaṭan
